title: Technological advance causes which curve to shift

content.prompt: An advance in technology will cause the

choices.label: aggregate demand curve to shift to the right
aggregate demand curve to shift to the left
short-run aggregate supply curve to shift to the left
long-run aggregate supply curve to shift to the left
long-run aggregate supply curve to shift to the right

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
